name: Worldy Wings Lite
description:
"Worldy Wings iPhone Game Is the Shmup You've Been Waiting For." - Gizmodo.com
Join the Worldy Wings fleet in the ultimate flying adventure! Sail through uncharted worlds
fighting wicked enemies!
Select the right plane for each world and score as many points as you can!

Features:

- Tons of enemies and power-ups!

- Auto saving checkpoints.

- Game Center Leaderoards and Achievements.

- Challenging old-school gameplay with amazing graphics!


Fasten your seat belts and get ready for fun!
